titles: Die Jovis, 6 Januarii. 1647. Additionall directions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the billeting of the army, when they are upon a march, or setled in their quarters.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings head in the old Bayley,
notes: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Variant; turned "m" in 'Parliament' in title (Steele I, 2740).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
